name: catstagram
description: ## Goal To build a single-page social media esque site. Users can view a random cat image drawn from the `https://thecatapi.com/` API. Users can then upvote/downvote it and make comments about it. All of which are then stored in session storage and retrieved if the user refreshes the page. Users can also ask for a new cat image which clears all stored values and allows for new upvoting/downvoting and commenting.
author: Aubrey Finkelstein
